snippet: Health care coverage, housing allowances and survivor benefits will become available to all legally married military spouses.
abstract: Defense Dept announces that it will begin offering benefits to same-sex spouses of military personnel and other employees by early Sept 2013, in response to Supreme Court decision that struck down Defense of Marriage Act.
lead_paragraph: Health care coverage, housing allowances and survivor benefits will become available to all legally married military spouses.

headline.main: Gay Spouses of Members of Military Get Benefits
headline.print_headline: Gay Spouses Of Members Of Military Get Benefits

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
